m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Austria Launching Legal Challenge Against EU Decision To Allow Hinkley Point C Nuclear Subsidies January 28th, 2015 by James Ayre   The government of Austria is planning to make a legal challenge with regard to the European Union’s relatively recent decision to allow the Hinkley Point C nuclear energy project to be subsidized to the tune of billions of pounds, according to recent reports. The European Union (EU) approved Hinkley Point C nuclear power plant receiving a £17.6 billion subsidy deal last October — a decision that was met with a fair amount of debate
